findings: Implemented accel_context strict_changed_files/fallback_confidence plus snippets_only/include_metadata lightweight output controls.
Added three-baseline token reduction metrics (vs_full_index, vs_changed_files, vs_snippets_only) with explicit baseline token counters.

Added verify failed-result cache controls (verify_cache_failed_results + verify_cache_failed_ttl_seconds) and extended verify jsonl structured fields (mode/fail_fast/cache_hits/cache_misses/fail_fast_skipped/command_index).
Touched-scope gates passed (ruff + pytest on mcp_server/orchestrator tests); full-repo gates still fail due pre-existing baseline issues unrelated to this change.
